text: Ben Chimberoff (born July 15, 1874, date of death unknown) was an American gymnast. He competed in four events at the 1904 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:Year of death missing Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ben Chimberoff
